/Applications/Xcode.app/Contents/Developer/Toolchains/XcodeDefault.xctoolchain/usr/bin/c++   -std=c++11 -fPIC -Wno-deprecated-declarations -isysroot /Applications/Xcode.app/Contents/Developer/Platforms/MacOSX.platform/Developer/SDKs/MacOSX10.14.sdk -Wl,-search_paths_first -Wl,-headerpad_max_install_names  CMakeFiles/clinfo.dir/clinfo.cpp.o  -o ../../../../bin/clinfo -Wl,-rpath,/Users/guohuiwang/dev/mine/libOpenCL-loader/lib ../../../../lib/libopencl_loader.dylib -ldl
